messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Logging.Name: Logging
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Logging.DirectoryPat:
The directory to write log files to.
Changes will only take effect on restart.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Logging.FilesToPrese:
The number of recent log files to keep around. Set <1 to disable.
Changes take effect on restart.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Logging.Level.Name: Level
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Logging.Level.Descri:
The logging level used to filter logging requests. May be ignored in the initial startup phase.
Changes take effect immediately.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Logging.ShouldLogToC:
Whether to spawn a console window for logging.
If one isn't already present, it may be spawned.
Changes take effect immediately.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Locations.Name: Locations
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Locations.Configs.De: Path to check for configuration files.
Path to check for game packs.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Locations.Libs.Name: Libs
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Locations.Libs.Descr: Path to check for dependency libraries.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Locations.Mods.Name: Mods
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Locations.Mods.Descr: Loading locations to check for mods.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.Locations.PatchedAss: Path to save pre-patched assemblies to. Set null to disable.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.NuGet.Name: NuGet
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.NuGet.EnableLoadingL: Allows checking NuGet feeds to load mod's library dependencies.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.NuGet.EnableLoadingM: Allows checking NuGet feeds to load mod's other-mod dependencies.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.NuGet.NuGetGamePackS: NuGet feeds to check for game packs.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.NuGet.NuGetLibSource: NuGet feeds to check for libraries.
messages.MonkeyLoader.Config.NuGet.NuGetModSource: NuGet feeds to check for mods.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Config.C: Show the scaling toggle even when not at the default scale for the avatar.
Show the locomotion selection even when a tool is equipped.
Show the scaling toggle and/or reset scale action even when a tool is equipped.
Show the reset scale action alongside the scaling toggle when it is always allowed.
Show the current inventory path when trying to save something.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Config.D: The Order Offset of the Destroy button on Inspector Headers. Higher is further right.
The Order Offset of the Duplicate button on Inspector Headers. Higher is further right.
The Order Offset of the Open Container button on Inspector Headers. Higher is further right.
Whether the inspector header text should be shown by default.
The Order Offset of the Worker Name button on Inspector Headers. Higher is further right.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Config.L:
Controls whether the load progress indicator on the splash screen of the graphical Unity client should be hijacked and made to show the loading state.
Only takes effect on the next launch.

Controls whether the loading is slowed down slightly to show every initializing monkey on the splash screen's loading state.
Only used when there is a load progress indicator and only takes effect on the next launch.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Config.T: Sets the background color of a tooltip.
Controls whether debug data for missing button tooltips is logged. Useful when wanting to add new labels.

Controls whether tooltips stick around after hovering off the button they're attached to.
Hover again after disabling to remove them.
When enabled, tooltips are created as regular slots instead of local ones. Can be used to show them to others. Experimental.
The time required hovering a button before a tooltip may be opened.
When enabled, a Hyperlink component's reason and URL are always shown in tooltips.
Sets the text color of a tooltip.
Sets the size of the text on a tooltip.
